name: Spider (Classic Card Game)
description:
Train your brain with a daily dose of Spider Solitaire! This modern take on a classic card game will keep you sharp. Simple and intuitive gameplay with a minimalistic design so that nothing gets between you and the game.

Try it out!

FEATURES:
- Easy to read cards
- Intuitive tap to play
- Intelligent auto-complete
- Auto-save, so you never lose your progress
- Unlimited undo
- Statistics

Spider Solitaire Rules:

Place cards in descending order in their matching suits. New players can test out their strategies on 1 and 2 suit games or step it up with games including 3 or 4 suits for a challenge.

You will learn quickly we promise! If you get stuck, tap on any card, and the app will automatically make a valid move if one exists.
